title: Fearne Cotton cuts a stylish figure as she attends breast cancer charity event
text:
She is one of the nation's most well-known and loved stars.

And Fearne Cotton looked in high spirits as she attended the Festifeel breast cancer charity photocall with CoppaFeel! at House of Vans in Waterloo, London on Saturday.

The presenter, 38, smiled away as she attended the event in a graphic tee and shiny metallic miniskirt.

Happy: Fearne Cotton, 38, looked in high spirits as she attended the Festifeel breast cancer charity photocall with CoppaFeel! at House of Vans in Waterloo, London on Saturday

Fearne added to her look with a CoppaFeel! black jacket and comfortable shoes.

She showcased her striking features with a simple slick of make-up, which complemented her shoulder length blonde locks.

The radio star was all smiles as she threw her support behind the festival she has helped curate for the eight years.

The beauty was seen without her musician husband Jesse Wood, 42.

Stylish: The presenter smiled away as she attended the event in a graphic tee and shiny metallic miniskirt

Looking good: Fearne added to her look with a CoppaFeel! black jacket and comfortable shoes

In a recent interview with Lorraine, the radio personality confessed that despite people thinking her relationship is 'perfect', she and Jesse in fact have had a fair few bumps along the way.

In the honest interview, Fearne also spoke of her battle with anxiety and panic attacks, admitting she still feels embarrassed by the issue.

Fearne has been married to Jesse since 2014, and the pair share two children - son Rex, six, and daughter Honey, three.

Good cause: The radio star was all smiles as she threw her support behind the festival she has helped curate for the eight years - Pictured with CoppaFeel! founder Kristin Hallenga

Fashionable: Fearne was joined at the event by Arielle Free who looked trendy in a figure-skimming leopard print jumpsuit

Pretty: The actress teamed her look with two dainty gold necklaces and hoop earrings

Meanwhile, Fearne was joined at the event by Arielle Free who looked trendy in a figure-skimming leopard print jumpsuit.

The actress teamed her look with two dainty gold necklaces and hoop earrings.

CoppaFeel! founder Kristin Hallenga was also at the event in her printed jacket, complete with wide leg trousers and funky shoes.
description: Fearne Cotton, 38, looked in high spirits as she attended the Festifeel breast cancer charity photocall with CoppaFeel! at House of Vans in Waterloo, London on Saturday.
